(Simplified: 窭)
Chinese Definition:
①(窶數)貧窮，貧寒：窶家子(貧窮人家的子弟)。用茅草結成的圓圈。放在頭上做頂東西的墊子。

窶字的基本解释

窶
jù
见“窭”。

窶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jù］
［《廣韻》其矩切，上麌，羣。］
亦作“寠1”。“窭1”的繁体字。
(1)贫穷得无法备礼物。亦泛指贫穷。
(2)指贫困的人。
(3)破旧。
(4)鄙陋；浅薄。
(5)指器量狭小；拘谨。
(6)即窭数。
[②]［lóu］
［《集韻》郎矦切，平矦，來。］
“窭2”的繁体字。
见“甌窶”。

窶字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　窶； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页867第46
【唐韻】其矩切【集韻】郡羽切，?音蔞。【說文】無禮居也。【徐註】階阼升降，所以行禮，貧無禮，故先見於屋室。【詩·邶風】終窶且貧。【傳】窶者無禮也。【爾雅·釋言】窶，貧也。【註】謂貧陋。【疏】由其無財以爲禮，故謂貧陋。　又【前漢·東方朔傳】盆下爲窶數。【師古註】窶數，戴器也。以盆盛物戴於頭者，則以窶數爲之，今賣白團餠人所用者是。【釋名】窶數，猶局促，皆小意也。　又【集韻】郞侯切【正韻】盧侯切，?音婁。【史記·淳于髠傳】甌窶滿簀。【裴駰註】甌窶，便側之地。　又【韻會】【正韻】?良據切，音慮。義同。

考證：〔【詩·衞風】終窶且貧。〕　謹照原文衞風改邶風。

Basic explanation of words
rustic
jù

rustic
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jù］
["Guangyun" its square cut, upper 麌, group. ]
Also known as "寠1". Traditional characters for "窭1".
(1) Too poor to prepare gifts. It also refers to poverty in general.
(2) Refers to poor people.
(3) Dilapidated.
(4) Contemptuous; shallow.
(5) The amount of fingers is small; restrained.
(6) That is the number of 窭.
[②]［lóu］
["Ji Yun" Lang Yu cut, Ping Yu, come. ]
"窭2" in traditional characters.
See "Ouqi".
rustic
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Acupoint Word Department] 　窭; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 867 No. 46
[Tang Yun] Its rectangular cut [Ji Yun] Jun Yu cut,? Yin Lou. [Said the text] rude home also. [Xu's Note] The ranks rise and fall, so they salute and are impolite, so they are seen in the house first. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】Endless and poor. [Biography] The shaman is also rude. 【Erya·Interpretation】Yao, poor. [Note] It is poor. 【Sparse】Because of his lack of wealth, he considers courtesy, so he is poor and humble.　[Previous Han·Dongfang Shuo Biography] The bottom of the basin is the number of 窭. [Shigu Note] Counting, wearing a device. Those who wear pots on their heads use 窭numbers, which are used by people who sell Bai Tuan Diao today. [Release name] The numbers are still cramped, and they are all trivial.　[Ji Yun] Yin Houqie [Zheng Yun] Lu Houqie,? Yin Lou. [Historical Records·Chun Yuyu Biography] Ouqi is full of bamboos. [Note to Pei Qi] Ou, just to the side.　[Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? Good data cut, sound consideration. The same meaning.
